alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 4:10PM CST until December 15 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN FREMONT...MILLS AND SOUTHEASTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 409 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Union, or 27 miles south of Omaha, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Glenwood and Pacific Junction around 425 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Thurman, Hastings and Tabor. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
